torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered in overlapping feathers. [npc.Her] new feathers follow the lines of [npc.her] figure, and are very smooth to the touch.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldRaptor(raptor)], [npc.skinFullDescription].
